Date: Wednesday, 4/30/1999
Subject: Roger Mercer healing process
Roger Mercer is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Subject: Progress of Josh Towers
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 3.09, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
